channel.title: Pvp-planet is back and viral
channel.description:
Update of our progress so far > Fellow moparscape Community
I would like to say a huge thank you to everyone who has supported me from the begging and the start IE [Jay] how ever this is coming along pretty faster than expected, i would like to say it is highly appreciated and respected for everyone participation in the community. here are some new coming updates Progress - New welcome interface Current one > Give me a moment < - write from scratch spawn-tab + New redesigned. - no random dcs -World Pvp Ep System > Search wiki < for how it works < Google < -World Pvp Bounty System with Shop rewards > also check Wiki < Google < -Home Bh craters to 100% functional with rewards and high-score board, once completed will upload bh craters high-score to website -custom homepage along with a custom theme -check all items like is spawn-able and not spawn-able -vote/donation system. [last thing] before release. -custom player profile and able to search preview > -Staff list along with request help preview > [url=https://gyazo.com/c66d6490f11e120e5ef5bcf3ac83054e]https://gyazo.com/c66d6490f11e120e5ef5bcf3ac83054e[/url] -Loyalty system with shop rewards> [url=http://i.imgur.com/bxGmakF.png|]http://i.imgur.com/bxGmakF.png|[/url] [url=http://i.imgur.com/bxGmakF.png]http://i.imgur.com/bxGmakF.png[/url] -custom player profile >[url=http://i.imgur.com/8vf5M6z.gif]http://i.imgur.com/8vf5M6z.gif[/url] -two different worlds -new custom background will update the progress. ------------------------------------------------------ There is a lot more been done but this was just something quick while i was on my ipad :) Sorry for half hearted, will put the effort when back at home :) Thank you for the support and pvp-planet staff team and rune-server support Update: Entire Mousing Decection was completely off [ Fixed ] New login screen need to change setgear. [fully function] need to edit items/ figure a good thing for iron man mode since world pvp[ suggestions toke in note ] [doneish] cache downloader done got to annoying [ done] when open client get white screen [ fixed] player-save error [ fixed] Custom spawntab, fully functional[doneish just gotta edit setget] check known dupes and test for plenty more [ requesting] -> we can negoiate the price.> glitches we can negotiate becauses theres a couple models wrong [leave comment if intrestede] new background [awaiting] Custom homepage along with custom forum theme [awaitng] -custom loginscreen[only one whats caught my eye so far. searching] might look into a custom dedesign -jframe work, fullyscreen ect[inprocess] -stabliity/ performance new game engine and more[inprocess] -player profile [in process] -client launcher[in process]
[SPOIL]Media can be found here: [url=https://gyazo.com/a63938450add8052345b7a0551f7c86a]https://gyazo.com/a63938450add8052345b7a0551f7c86a[/url] [url=https://gyazo.com/534a8e868e7ae1e92534616e7a2c96f9]https://gyazo.com/534a8e868e7ae1e92534616e7a2c96f9[/url][/SPOIL]
i appreciate all the support and lovely comment, it makes the universe go round :) Thank you Ryan PVP-PLANET Community Pvp-planet staff

item.title: Pvp-planet is back and viral
item.dc:creator: @RealityOfPking RealityOfPking
item.description:
@RealityOfPking wrote:

Update of our progress so far > Fellow moparscape Community

I would like to say a huge thank you to everyone who has supported me from the begging and the start IE [Jay]
how ever this is coming along pretty faster than expected, i would like to say it is highly appreciated and respected for everyone participation in the community. here are some new coming updates
Progress

  • New welcome interface Current one > Give me a moment <
  • write from scratch spawn-tab + New redesigned.
  • no random dcs
    -World Pvp Ep System > Search wiki < for how it works < Google <
    -World Pvp Bounty System with Shop rewards > also check Wiki < Google <
    -Home Bh craters to 100% functional with rewards and high-score board, once completed will upload bh craters high-score to website
    -custom homepage along with a custom theme
    -check all items like is spawn-able and not spawn-able
    -vote/donation system. [last thing] before release.
    -custom player profile and able to search preview >
    -Staff list along with request help preview > https://gyazo.com/c66d6490f11e120e5ef5bcf3ac83054e
    -Loyalty system with shop rewards> http://i.imgur.com/bxGmakF.png| http://i.imgur.com/bxGmakF.png
    -custom player profile >http://i.imgur.com/8vf5M6z.gif
    -two different worlds
    -new custom background
    will update the progress.

There is a lot more been done but this was just something quick while i was on my ipad
Sorry for half hearted, will put the effort when back at home
Thank you for the support and pvp-planet staff team and rune-server support
Update:
Entire Mousing Decection was completely off [ Fixed ]
New login screen need to change setgear. [fully function] need to edit items/ figure a good thing for iron man mode since world pvp[ suggestions toke in note ] [doneish]
cache downloader done got to annoying [ done]
when open client get white screen [ fixed]
player-save error [ fixed]
Custom spawntab, fully functional[doneish just gotta edit setget]
check known dupes and test for plenty more [ requesting] -> we can negoiate the price.> glitches we can negotiate becauses theres a couple models wrong [leave comment if intrestede]
new background [awaiting]
Custom homepage along with custom forum theme [awaitng]
-custom loginscreen[only one whats caught my eye so far. searching] might look into a custom dedesign
-jframe work, fullyscreen ect[inprocess]
-stabliity/ performance new game engine and more[inprocess]
-player profile [in process]
-client launcher[in process]

[SPOIL]Media can be found here:
https://gyazo.com/a63938450add8052345b7a0551f7c86a
https://gyazo.com/534a8e868e7ae1e92534616e7a2c96f9[/SPOIL]

i appreciate all the support and lovely comment, it makes the universe go round
Thank you
Ryan
PVP-PLANET Community
Pvp-planet staff
